head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DEUTSCH, TESSIE (NEE MOLLOV)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DEUTSCH, TESSIE (NEE MOLLOV)

block.p: DEUTSCH-Tessie (nee Mollov). Died February 15, 1998. Survived by son Barry Deutsch of Canton, CT, daughter Kerri Maner of Campbell Hall, NY, brother Norman Mollov, of Jamaica, NY, and six grandchildren. Funeral services 1 PM, today, Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY. For information call Weinstein Mortuary of Hartford, CT.
